column5: https://buydeeper.com  What do you guys think of these? Any good? Just something to catch the fishermen? What about other brands?
Here is review on the iBobber
You need something to tell you how deep it is in a 3ft creek?  lol

There is a pretty limited range of where it would be useful, can't see them being appealing enough to make it worth the money to most people, but their marketing has been so aggressive that I'm sure a bunch of people will get suckered into buying them, use them once or twice and then end up on kijiji for half the price a year later
